{{BetaContent}}
The '''Idol's Chime''' is a [[:Category:Sacred Bells|sacred bell]] in ''[[Dark Souls II]]''.

{{Description
|First paragraph  = Sacred bell imbued with the prayers of a renowned saint. Catalyst for miracles and hexes.
|Second paragraph = The saint came to these lands from a peaceful country. However, no more can be divulged about her to such transient travellers.}}

Attack type: Spell/[[Strike (damage type)|Strike]]
[[Category:Dark Souls II: Weapons]]
[[Category:Sacred Bells]]
